sentence.Network_en: A census in 1980 revealed that approximately 6 percent of rural Nigerien men are wage earners.
sentence.Network_cn: 1980年的一次人口调查披露,尼日尔的农村居民中,有将近6%是挣工资者.

PerfectNetExp.abs: niger 黑的, nigerien 尼日尔人, niger 黑色的

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Niger
1. of or relating to the people of Nigeria;

sentences.sentence: "a Nigerian novelist won the Noble Prize for literature this year"

auth_sentence.content: The French and Nigerien soldiers have beefed up security with the Malian armed forces, but the invisible threat remains.
auth_sentence.res_content: The French and Nigerien soldiers have beefed up security with the Malian armed forces, but the invisible threat remains.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The French and Nigerien soldiers have beefed up security with the Malian armed forces, but the invisible threat remains.

auth_sentence.content: But it will do so while protecting the life of all those on Nigerien soil.
auth_sentence.res_content: But it will do so while protecting the life of all those on Nigerien soil.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But it will do so while protecting the life of all those on Nigerien soil.

auth_sentence.content: They will likely arrest some of us, but they cannot arrest all the Nigerien people, he said.
auth_sentence.res_content: They will likely arrest some of us, but they cannot arrest all the Nigerien people, he said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They will likely arrest some of us, but they cannot arrest all the Nigerien people, he said.
